channel.title: CVE Feed for UniFi -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for UniFi -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-8213|2024-08-04T09:56:27.443Z -- unifi -- protect%20for%20unifi%20cloud%20key%20gen2%20plus
item.description: An information exposure vulnerability exists in UniFi Protect before v1.13.4-beta.5 that allowed unauthenticated attackers access to valid usernames for the UniFi Protect web application via HTTP response code and response timing.
